NOM - Jerk Chicken

Trying something new in the neighborhood.

I decided to treat myself to something different for lunch. Jamaican food from Ela's Caribbean Grill. This was the Jerk Chicken with red beans & rice, and cabbage. It was the "mild" version, so it had a nice kick but not too spicy. Chased it with some strong Ginger beer.

The chicken was nice and succulent. Large amount of rice. All-in-all a great lunch. I'll certainly be back to try some of the other dishes.

Meta

Originally posted on March 5, 2021, by David Mead.
